name: Custom Plugin QA System
description: Enterprise QA testing plugin. 7 agents, 7 skills, test automation, quality strategies, performance/security testing, 20+ projects.
author: Claude Code QA Team

agents.name: Test Strategy & Planning
agents.description: Test planning, coverage analysis, test case design, QA strategy, and quality assurance methodologies.

agents.name: Unit Testing & Frameworks
agents.description: Jest, Vitest, Pytest. Mocking, fixtures, code coverage, TDD.

agents.name: Integration & E2E Testing
agents.description: API testing, integration testing, E2E (Cypress, Playwright), test automation.

agents.name: Performance & Load Testing
agents.description: Load testing, stress testing, performance benchmarking, scalability validation.

agents.name: Security Testing & Compliance
agents.description: Security testing, vulnerability scanning, OWASP, compliance testing.

agents.name: Test Automation & CI/CD
agents.description: Test automation, CI/CD integration, continuous testing, DevOps QA.

agents.name: Quality Metrics & Reporting
agents.description: Quality metrics, KPIs, dashboards, trend analysis, continuous improvement.

commands.name: test-strategy
commands.description: QA strategy, planning, coverage approach, test design

commands.name: testing-guide
commands.description: Testing frameworks, tools, best practices, implementation guides

commands.name: qa-project
commands.description: 20+ QA projects: automation, strategy, continuous testing

commands.name: quality-metrics
commands.description: Quality metrics, KPIs, measurement strategies, dashboards
